resources.string: The classic case – swing dance with a random partner. Registrations will be handled on the spot. All leaders and followers sign up individually to compete in the Jack’n’Jill. You can enter only one of the Open and Advanced Jack n Jill competitions.

The classic case – swing dance with a random partner. Registrations will be handled on the spot. All leaders and followers sign up individually to compete in the Jack’n’Jill. You can enter only one of the Open and Advanced Jack n Jill competitions.
Faster and faster swing outs. The last survivors win. This competition will be held on the Sunday night party. The registration will be taken on the spot.

Here dancers have to register as couples – no change in partners throughout the competition. Dancing with a partner you know and are used to, should deliver something extraordinary on the dance floor. Prepare well and show us what you got!
